channel.title: container on Maruf's
channel.description: Recent content in container on Maruf's

item.title: My Kubectl Cheat Sheet
item.description: Kubectl Cheat Sheet > minikube version > minikube start > kubectl version > kubectl get nodes Run app in kubernetes example code of kubernetes > kubectl run kubernetes-bootcamp --image=docker.io/jocatalin/kubernetes-bootcamp:v1 --port=8080 also run GRPS_Sample //problematic > kubectl run kubernetes-grpc-sample --image=maruftuhin/server_grpc_sample --port=8088 See deployments > kubectl get deployments run proxy and echo > kubectl proxy setting up POD_NAME variable > export POD_NAME=$(kubectl get pods -o go-template --template '{{range .
